title-group.article-title: INTERIOR ESTIMATES FOR SECOND-ORDER DIFFERENCES OF SOLUTIONS OF FINITE-DIFFERENCE ELLIPTIC BELLMAN'S EQUATIONS

abstract.p: We establish interior estimates for the second-order finite differences of solutions of finite-difference approximations for uniformly elliptic Bellman's equations.
